Duke W. Coon

Mayor

* **Phone** [936-522-3010](tel:9365223010)
* **Address** [300 West Davis   
   Conroe, TX 77301

  Opens in new window](https://www.cityofconroe.org/duke.coon@cityofconroe.org)

Mayor Duke W. Coon
==================

![MHP_6502-Edit - Copy](https://www.cityofconroe.org/Images/City%20Council/Council%20Members/2024%20Council/MHP_6502-Edit%20-%20Copy.jpg?t=202411120927160)The Mayor can be reached at: P.O. Box 3066, Conroe, TX 77305; by phone at (936) 522-3010; by fax at (936) 522-3009 or by [email

Opens in new window](mailto:duke.coon@cityofconroe.org).
